reviewText: It's like Cake Mania plus 3 other games in one.  My favorite shop is now the Sushi one, some crazy anime cat girl comes in.  Watch out for Superman and the Vampires, they aren't very nice to the other customers.   This is much better than just Cake Mania.

Kept me entertained for at least 12 hours so far and I'm not done all the game modes yet.

I was hoping for more of the actual Cake Mania game mode but you only get 25 stages I believe. Which is like, hello, isn't this CAKE Mania? I'm sitting here making burgers? Which is actually pretty fun though, so that's not a big deal.

Cheesy dialogue like all the other cake mania games. If you can ignore the cringe, this game is fun and entertaining.
The mouse keeps lagging and it's very frustrating to play when you can't get a house of the mouse.
